title: [Discussion]: Runeterran Pizza
body:
Since Taco's do exist in some capacity on Runeterra (Kled & Noxus), I was wondering if Pizza exists on Runeterra as well. If it does, which Faction would have it & what toppings do you think they'd use?
https://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/1/1b/Does_Not_Compute_Emote.png

replies.body:
Miniature historical food analysis, mixed with correspondence of Runeterra's factions incoming: 

Tacos - today's versions are based on a combination of European and Native American cuisines in our world (mostly originally American with European ingredients often included; can you imagine a taco buffet today without cheese or sour cream?), so likely a mixture of Noxus's cuisine with the cuisine of northeastern Shurima (in the jungles; the part of Shurima that's closest to what Ixtal is like)

Therefore,

Pizza - mostly native Italian, but mixed with the sauce of the fascinating American tomato - if we assume that tomatoes are also from Ixtal's area, then it's likely a mixture of mostly Demacian ingredients with tomatoes that managed to find their way from the jungles to Demacia through trade routes (perhaps through Piltover?)
Does Demacia even trade with other nations, though?
Not officially no (apart maybe from their allied nations like Arbormark and stuff), but there may be Black Markets!

I think they do trade a bit with Piltover, if I remember correctly. They have good relationships with them. But it would probably only be basic trade like food and essentials (like tomatoes!), nothing like tech.

"Black market Demacian pizzas" sounds pretty amazing.

Someone should tell Sylas he can stop eating high-protein prison rats. :P
Look, as anyone from Fear Factor can tell you, if you eat enough kangaroo testicles you kinda only want to eat kangaroo testicles.

> 
> Someone should tell Sylas he can stop eating high-protein prison rats. :P
But he said black markets, which is like, literally an illegal market. And the image I sent says official trade isnt permitted, which means they dont trade legally.
If I had to guess, Ionia would have them. Since most of the people in Ionia are farmers, there is high chance that they actually have something like pizza with different ingredients of course

> [{quoted}](name=FSRER,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AuELtv4L,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-08-07T16:40:37.626+0000)
>
> If I had to guess, Ionia would have them. Since most of the people in Ionia are farmers, there is high chance that they actually have something like pizza with different ingredients of course

Ionia's main grain seems to be rice though, like in eastern Asia in our world. Concept art definitely seems to show a big emphasis on rice farming. And rice flour...is not the most ideal for making a pizza dough. Rice can be very fickle. Take it from someone who was recently doing a job making fat sandwich wraps in rice wraps. They would always rip!

However, perhaps there are the Runeterran equivalent of naan pizzas around the places where Karma (and possibly Jhin) come from? But then again, they'd have to have access to jungle-grown tomatoes to make a proper pizza. Ionia is likely also not that big on cheese or dairy, except, again, for the places that correspond to India in our world (do we have an exact location for that in Ionia, even Karma's hometown?)
